chat_history: I've been experiencing shortness of breath and chest pain.
I also feel extremely tired and dizzy.
It started after walking up the stairs.
I have a high fever and chills.
There’s a constant pressure in my head and my neck feels stiff.
It’s hard to look at bright lights — could it be something serious?
My child has been vomiting for two days and now has a rash.
She seems very weak and isn’t eating anything.
We gave paracetamol but the fever hasn’t gone down.
I’ve been coughing up blood and it’s getting worse each day.
I’m losing weight rapidly without trying.
It’s hard to sleep because of the night sweats.
I’m pregnant and have been feeling unusually dizzy and nauseous.
Today I fainted in the shower.
My blood pressure readings are lower than usual.
